name: Yodeling The Llamas - PREMIUM
description:
---YODELING THE LLAMAS - PREMIUM---

PREMIUM includes yodeling the llamas but AD FREE!!!!

Tap your way past billions of dollars worth of Llamas. Make your way to the top of the world and unlock the very best llamas.
FEATURES:
-12 Llamas to unlock
-upgrade system for more llamas-per-tap
-upgrade for automatic Llama's
-2 special llamas
-day/evening/night system to change the theme depending on times
-world class in-game music to tickle your yodeling llama happiness ;)

--5 MINI GAMES!--
Astro Llama
Llama Ball
Llama Flip
Smashy Llama
Llama Bounce
